pos_mean_info_list.mean: 磨光，擦亮；上光剂，擦亮剂；优雅，精良
有礼貌地；客气地；委婉地；殷勤地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通常用词，指言论举止无论何时均严谨有礼，很有教养。
语气弱于polite，着重只达到社交的一般要求，避免粗鲁。
指言谈举止典雅，谦恭有礼，更侧重考虑他人的感情与尊严。

word_group.brief_definition: 礼貌的方式；礼貌的举止
礼貌行为；礼貌的举止；文明行为

bilingual.target: 桑迪是一个高个子、有礼貌的女孩。

bilingual.source: He gave a polite smile when he received the gift.
bilingual.target: 他收到礼物时露出了一个有礼貌的微笑。

bilingual.source: She wrote a polite letter to decline the invitation.
bilingual.target: 她写了一封有礼貌的信来婉拒邀请。

bilingual.source: It is polite to say "thank you" when someone helps you.
bilingual.target: 当有人帮助你时，说“谢谢”是有礼貌的。

bilingual.source: It's polite of you to apologise in time.
bilingual.target: 你及时道歉是有礼貌的。

bilingual.source: It is polite of you to say so .
bilingual.target: 你这么说是很有礼貌的。

bilingual.source: I think the boy a polite fellow.
bilingual.target: 我认为这个男孩是个有礼貌的人.

list.abstract: polite（英 [pəˈlaɪt]，美 [pəˈlaɪt]），英语单词，形容词，意思为有礼貌的；讲礼貌的；有教养的。短语搭配有be polite to（对...有礼貌）。例句为“Just be polite and answer honestly.（礼貌一点，诚实回答。）” polite形容词类近义词有civil、elegant等，相关反义词有impolite、uncivil。比较级为politer。最高级为politest。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm through being polite, God damn it! Now, take me down!
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈的，我礼貌够了，送我下去。

yingyinNormal.en: He was polite and respectful and super smart. And I hired him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他很客气，很有礼貌，也很聪明。所以，我聘用了他

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, you have to let somebody else answer. Why? Because it's polite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你得让其他人也参与答题。为什么？因为这是礼貌。

yingyinNormal.en: There were four of us, agents. Not just agents. Polite term. Alex. Gabriel. Me. And Ajay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有四个人，特工。不只是特工。这是委婉用词。阿列克斯，加百列，我，还有阿杰。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't knock. Just walk in. Why be polite to the world's leading expert on the dung beetle?
yingyinNormal.zh: 别敲门，尽管进来吧，对一位世界领先地位的屎克螂专家客气什么啊？

yingyinNormal.en: It's a lovely apartment. Thank you. Would you like a tour? I was just being polite, but all right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这房子真漂亮，谢谢，想参观一下吗？我只是客套一下，但好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Were the Romans polite when they salted the ground of Carthage to make sure nothing would ever grow again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 当罗马人在迦太基(北非一古城)地上撒盐，确保以后寸草不生的时候，他们讲礼貌了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What's so great about them? They're very well-liked in their neighborhood, they have very polite children, and they are sophisticated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们有什么好的？他们在原来的社区很受欢迎，他们的孩子很懂礼貌，他们很有深度。

yingyinNormal.en: Unless, I mean, if it helps, I could stay and watch. No! Well, I didn't want to anyway. You know, just thought I'd be polite and offer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非，我是说，如果有帮助的话，我可以留下来当观众。 不必！喔，反正我也不想看。你知道的，我只是想要礼貌性地问一声。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you have a stomachache, too? No. Why, do you? No. Why did you ask if I had one, too? Just making polite dinner conversation. Your turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也胃疼吗？没有啊，怎么了，你胃疼吗？不疼。那你为啥问我是不是也胃疼？就是吃饭的时候随便聊聊，该你说了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes? Yes. It was pity. He was too polite to send her packing in front of everyone, you see, but not wanting to expose us to the presumptuous wench any further, he took her apart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？真的。他太礼貌了，所以不忍当众拒绝她，又不想我们再受这冒昧的村姑影响，所以他把她带走了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage:
polite在句中可用作定语或表语；用作表语时，polite后可接介词短语或动词不定式，例：
It wasn't very polite of you to serve yourself without asking.
你也不问一声就自己吃起来是不礼貌的。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Most important of all, be <highlight>polite</highlight> when asking the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的是，问路时要有礼貌。

examination_example.sentence: Common sense is not so common.Please watch your behavior and be <highlight>polite</highlight> in public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请注意你的行为，并在公共场合保持礼貌。

examination_example.sentence: Always keep in mind: be <highlight>polite</highlight> and patient.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 永远记住：要有礼貌和耐心。
